name: RCC Ventures
overview:
RCC Ventures LLC is an independent specialty finance firm that excels in providing multiple debt instruments and flexible financing solutions for mid-market, private equity, and venture-backed businesses at any stage of development. We have the proven capacity to provide you with strong capital backing from a wide range of respected institutional lenders, and our flexible structures accommodate inherent operational volatility.

With our solid 30 years of experience, RCC Venture partners understand the complexity and unique characteristics of a wide range of business models. And, by recognizing enterprise value in firms before and after profitability, we have the capabilities to create additional liquidity with minor or no dilution to stretch the equity runway.

Lifespan Funding: Whether youâ€™re receiving your first round of venture capital financing or preparing for your IPO, RCC Ventures is primed to help you increase corporate valuation by raising debt in the least dilutive format.

30 Years of Experience And Stability: With more than three decades of experience, we offer the proven ability to seek out, negotiate, and arrange the most optimal deal structure and terms through your high-growth companyâ€™s entire lifespan. We work with you through the pre-revenue, developmental, growth, mature, and profitable stages.

Robust Team of Finance Specialists: Our specialists offer in-depth knowledge and expertise in term loans, revolvers, master lease lines and structural/custom finance solutions. Through our solutions-oriented process, our clients can expect us to be results-driven with favorable financing terms to help them reach their full potential.

Privately-Held and Independent: We are not dependent on any one source of capital or the public markets for capital, liberating us from their volatility and requirements. As a result, we provide a wide range of custom-tailored debt and equity solutions tailored to your needs.

Multiple Sources of Capital: As a complementary and in some cases, alternative source of financing to bank dollars, we offer the capacity and scale to meet your customized needs. Our partners include some of the nationâ€™s most secure investment firms and financial institutions.

Strong Customer-Centric Support: We offer you a customer-oriented approach along with guidance, insights, and services.
